title: Kirchhoff loop - resistor pd - emf x 8 and R x 2

content.question: The figure shows a battery of <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math> <math alttext="script uppercase E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Ɛ</mi></math> connected in series with two resistors, one of resistance <math alttext="R sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and one of resistance <math alttext="R sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>. The potential difference across resistor <math alttext="R sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> is <math alttext="delta V sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>. The battery is then replaced by a battery of <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math> <math alttext="8 times script uppercase E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>8</mn><mi>Ɛ</mi></math>, and resistors <math alttext="R sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="R sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> are replaced with resistors of resistance <math alttext="2 times R sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="2 times R sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, respectively. In the new circuit, what is the potential difference across the resistor of resistance <math alttext="2 times R sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="2 times delta V sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="4 times delta V sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="8 times delta V sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>8</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="16 times delta V sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>16</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="8 times delta V sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>8</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
